data.name: Beat Saber: Skrillex – 'Ragga Bomb (feat. Ragga Twins)'
data.detailed_description:
Get the track 'Ragga Bomb (feat. Ragga Twins)' by Skrillex and slash the beats! This track is part of Skrillex Music Pack, brought to you by OWSLA/Atlantic Records.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
